title: 关于Not-Enough-Items 1.4.6安装后游戏崩溃的问题
author: ruiyao369
txt_content:
我家的mc1.4.6 在用forge装了  CodeChickenCore-Mod-1.4.6  后接着装了  Not-Enough-Items-Mod-1.4.6 后。删了META-INF文件夹后，进入游戏里。可以移动，跳，打怪都可以。但是一按e键查看人物。就会崩溃显示如下信息。肿么办啊！？
Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Rendering screen

A full error report has been saved to D:\MClauncher\客服端\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-02-01_19.39.18-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(



--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 9c7e568b --------
Full report at:
D:\MClauncher\客服端\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-02-01_19.39.18-client.txt
Please show that file to Mojang, NOT just this screen!

Generated 13-2-1 下午7:39

replies.author: h85318
replies.txt_content:
我想可能有這些問題
1.NEI版本與forge不符合
2.FORGE版本不適用
3.與其他模組相衝
4.模組裝錯地方
因為不知道哪一個
所以我就都列出來了
